name: Space Disagreement!
description:
Peter Drake: Game design & programming

Steve Blumenthal: Audio & additional programming

Elsa Camous: Art & graphics

For now, move your ship around by clicking on adjacent stars. You can try to mine resources at each star. Use the slider to try for 1-12 resources. A 6-sided die is rolled, if it's at least the number you're trying for, you get those resources; otherwise the planet explodes.

White planets provide the Victory Point resource; you can only mine 1 of these.

Black planets have been destroyed.

Click on the Miner at lower right to roll 2 dice when mining.

Click on the Navigator to jump 2 stars away.
